column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Radio operator says : " Hey !
#Text=I just need to make an announcement to the entire city .
#Text=How do I do that ?
#Text=" Radio operator says : " Who do you think you are ?
#Text=" Ming - Hua says : " He 's the man who just took down the Earth Queen .
#Text=You want to be next ?!
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Ming - Hua , please .
#Text=We 're here to help citizens like him , not hurt them .
#Text=Now , can you help me ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Attention citizens of Ba Sing Se .
#Text=I have an important announcement to make .
#Text=Moments ago , the Earth Queen was brought down by the hands of revolutionaries , including myself .
#Text=I 'm not going to tell you my name , because my identity is not important .
#Text=I 'm not here to take over the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=I think you 've had enough of leaders telling you what to do .
#Text=It 's time for you to find your own path .
#Text=No longer will you be oppressed by tyrants .
#Text=From now on , you are free !
#Text=I deliver Ba Sing Se be into the hands of the people !
#Text=" Mako says : " We have to get out of here , Bolin .
#Text=Zaheer came here to take out the Earth Queen , and now Korra is next .
#Text=" Prisoner says : " You know that guy ?
#Text=He 's my hero !
#Text=" Mako says : " Shut up !
#Text=You have to metalbend us out of here .
#Text=C'mon !
#Text=I know you can do it !
#Text=This is your time !
#Text=" Bolin says : " You said before " was my time " .
#Text=" Mako says : " I know I did it , but now it 's really your time .
#Text=Do it !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Did you see that ?
#Text=I did it !
#Text=I mean , not for us , but I metalbent all the other cells open !
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't think that was you .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Listen to me .
#Text=I 'm going to set you free , but I want to talk to you first .
#Text=I have a message that I need you to take to Korra .
#Text="
